Skin Care Moisturizer

Most Loved Face Moisturizer for Summer in Pakistan: Oily and Dry Skin Edition

We all think we know our skin, but do we really when it comes to choosing a face moisturizer? Knowing more about your skin type allows you to take better care of facial skin. Did you know that the skin on your face is directly hit by pollution, sun, and what not?

Facial skin is thinner than the rest of our body. Your face is also the area that forms aging signs first. This is why skin experts recommend a separate moisturizer for your face and also sunscreen every day. A combination of both is more perfect to give your facial skin the protection it needs.

If you’re looking to shield against this heat, skin experts at Allure Beauty did all the research for you. As your favorite for online skincare products, our goal was to bring you the best brands in value price. And we found the best face moisturizer in Pakistan.

Face Moisturizer in Pakistan

You will find almost all international brands for face moisturizer in Pakistan. From Dr. Barbara to Clinique you will find a wide collection of moisturizers at Allure Beauty that cater to oily, dry, and combination skin. Here are some most-loved moisturizes for the summer heat:

  • L’Oreal Hyaluronic Acid Plumping Day Cream 50 ml for Rs. 2580 – L’Oreal brings a non-sticky gel formula to help oil stay in control. This is most-loved among women in late 20s who want to fight back new born fine lines.
  • Aijaz Aslam Face Cream Anti-Aging Sun Protection 30 ml is for Rs. 2990 – Using an organix mix, this face moisturizer helps induce vitamin E and argan oil to moisturize and help your skin repair sun damage.
  • Barbara Sturm Face Cream 20 ml for Rs. 13,650 – If you’re looking for something that is good for all skin types, this one is lightweight and has anti-aging benefits.

Best Face Moisturizer in Pakistan

Since every skin type varies, the best face moisturizer in Pakistan was a little hard to find. One thing suits you, but it won't suit your friend. But after reading thousands of reviews, the name Clinique popped up a lot when we focused on face moisturizer with active ingredients. Active ingredients target skin concerns like:

  • Dehydration
  • Sun Damage
  • Eczema
  • Acne
  • Anti-aging
  • Clogged pores
  • Uneven tone

Does any of this sound familiar to you? If so, Allure Beauty found what is missing from your daily face moisturizer. Clinique face moisturizer formulas include vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, and ceramides. All these are added shield your skin through tough environmental conditions. These moisturizers are great for acne-prone and oily skin because they do not clog pores. Plus, Clinique products are fragrance-free. So, you don't have to worry about allergic reactions. Allure Beauty loves a dermatologically tested product, which is why Clinique made it to the best face moisturizer in Pakistan. Here’s the best face moisturizer in Pakistan with price:

  • Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion 125 ml is for Rs. 14750 – A lightweight addition to your routine for those with oily or normal to dry skin. It's an easy-absorbing mix that hydrates for 8 hours and strengthens skin against sun rays.

First Figure Out Your Skin Type

The best way to figure out your skin type is to simply wash your face and let it rest for a while. If there is a noticeable shine, with enlarged pores, then you are likely to have an oily skin. On the contrary, a dry skin type might feel like a rough surface that is craving moisture.

Then, there are some struggling with a combination skin type, neither oily nor dry but a mix of both. You spend a great amount of money on skincare. It makes your skin break out right before attending a wedding. Or completely dries out your skin leaving patches all under your makeup.

The worse bit is that even if you moisturize your face, it still isn’t working. This is because you’re not using what is for your skin. Also, cheaper face moisturizers have lower concentration of active ingredients. They help repair and protect your skin. So, looking for specific skin concerns and knowing what the formula is doing for you is recommended. Always read reviews before trying out a face moisturizer on your face.
